name: NeuroConnect
description:
Make connections and send signals between neurons to activate regions of the brain in order to progress to next level.  **There is no ending as this game is not complete.

Controls: Left click a neuron and drag to another neuron and release to make connection.

White neurons distribute one signal per connection.

Colored neurons transfer all of their signals to next neuron.

Art: Diana  (https://lake-monster-games.itch.io/)

Coding: Mike (https://lake-monster-games.itch.io/)

Music: Nick
